com.ibm.streamsx.rest

Class StreamingAnalyticsConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.streamsx.rest.StreamsConnection
      • com.ibm.streamsx.rest.StreamingAnalyticsConnection
  • Deprecated. 
    Replaced by StreamingAnalyticsService

    @Deprecated
public class StreamingAnalyticsConnection
extends StreamsConnection
    Connection to a Streaming Analytics Service Instance.

    This class exists for backward compatibility and use is discouraged. The preferred method for interacting with the Streaming Analytics Service is to use instances of StreamingAnalyticsService.

    • Field Summary

      • allowInsecureHosts

        public boolean allowInsecureHosts(boolean allowInsecure)
        Deprecated. 
        This function is used to disable checking the trusted certificate chain and should never be used in production environments
        Overrides:
        allowInsecureHosts in class StreamsConnection
        Parameters:
        allowInsecure -
        • true - disables checking
        • false - enables checking (default)
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating the state of the connection after this method was called.
        • true - if checking is disabled
        • false - if checking is enabled

      • cancelJob

        public boolean cancelJob(java.lang.String jobId)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: StreamsConnection
        Cancels a job identified by the jobId.
        WARNING: This cancels the job in the domain and instance identified by the environment variables STREAMS_DOMAIN_ID and STREAMS_INSTANCE_ID which may not be the intended job.
        Use Job.cancel() to cancel a job.
        Overrides:
        cancelJob in class StreamsConnection
        Parameters:
        jobId - string identifying the job to be cancelled
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating
        • true if the jobId is cancelled
        • false if the jobId did not get cancelled
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
